name: soundcloud_scrape_comments
description: Scrape comments from a SoundCloud track. Returns comments with author, content, timestamp position, and date.

steps.code: const comments = []; const commentEls = document.querySelectorAll('.commentItem, [class*="commentItem"], [class*="comment-item"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(commentEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = commentEls[i]; const authorEl = el.querySelector('.commentItem__username a, [class*="username"] a, [class*="author"] a'); const contentEl = el.querySelector('.commentItem__body, [class*="body"], [class*="text"]'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, [class*="timestamp"], [class*="time"]'); const positionEl = el.querySelector('[class*="atTime"], [class*="position"]'); if (contentEl && contentEl.textContent.trim().length > 0) { comments.push({ author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : 'Anonymous', content: contentEl ? contentEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 300) : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', timestamp_position: positionEl ? positionEl.textContent.trim() : '' }); } } const totalEl = document.querySelector('[class*="commentCount"], [class*="comment"] span'); return { total_comments: totalEl ? totalEl.textContent.trim() : '', scraped_count: comments.length, comments: comments, url: window.location.href }
